meanings: (기술 등을 전함) teach, pass down, initiate (sb into sth)
[동사] (기술 등을 전해 받음) learn (as an apprentice)

vlive.korean: [철통보안 작전 전수][속닥 속닥] 그래요? [In secret] [Whispering] Really? 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE REALITY "TIME TO TWICE" - Noraebang Battle EP.01

examples.korean: be initiated into the mysteries of the art 발음듣기 그 기술의 비방을 전수받다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: be initiated into the mysteries of the art 발음

examples.korean: The teacher initiated us into the mysteries [secrets] of judo. 발음듣기 그 선생님이 우리에게 유도의 비법을 전수해 주셨다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The teacher initiated us into the mysteries [secrets] of judo. 발음

examples.korean: Experts call it a 'transmission breakdown.' 발음듣기 전문가들은 '전수 붕괴'라고 부른다. Neungyule
examples.english: Experts call it a 'transmission breakdown.' 발음

examples.korean: He inherited his taekwondo from his master. 발음듣기 그는 사부에게서 태권도를 전수받았다 Neungyule
examples.english: He inherited his taekwondo from his master. 발음

examples.korean: The skills have been passed down the generations. 발음듣기 그 기술은 대대로 전수되었습니다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The skills have been passed down the generations. 발음
